org.openmuc.jdlms

Class TcpConnectionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openmuc.jdlms.ConnectionBuilder<TcpConnectionBuilder>
      • org.openmuc.jdlms.TcpConnectionBuilder

  • public class TcpConnectionBuilder
extends ConnectionBuilder<TcpConnectionBuilder>
    Builder class to establish a DLMS connection via TCP.
